column1: Smoque BBQ////After one bite of the meat
column2: I knew I was going to give it at least four. After all the remaining bites
column3: I knew why the sides were the size they were. I was pleasantly full. The coleslaw
column4: after a few bites of the rich bbq sauce was a pleasant palate cleaner
column5: preparing you for the next bite of perfectly smoked meat.
